metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1412 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
sys/sys_unix.c in the ioQuake3 engine on Unix and Linux, as used in Worldof Padman 1.5.x before 1.5.1.1 and OpenArena 0.8.x-15 and 0.8.x-16, allowsremote game servers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharactersin a long fs_game variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ioquake3 - 1.36+u20160122+dfsg1-1
ioquake3-server - 1.36+u20160122+dfsg1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: openarena package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
ioquake3 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.36+u20160122+dfsg1-1').
